subject: Marathon Running
Boston Marathon
lead_paragraph: Desisa, who formed a bond with the people of Boston after winning the men’s race in 2013, pulled away from an uncommonly large pack of contenders. Caroline Rotich of Kenya won the women’s race.
snippet: Desisa, who formed a bond with the people of Boston after winning the men’s race in 2013, pulled away from an uncommonly large pack of contenders. Caroline Rotich of Kenya won the women’s race.
